“The Emotions Tapestry” is finally BACK IN STOCK! Link to our Etsy shop and website in bio ☺️💕✨⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
All of our tapestries are roughly 5ft (60 in) x 4ft (48 in). ⁣To release fabric creases, we recommend steaming or dampening the fabric with cold water & air drying. ⁣⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
⁣⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀

node.text:
***NOW CLOSED***The Conversation Deck (Digital Download) is HERE just in time for back-to-school season and I am TOO excited to share it with you!!⁣⁣ To celebrate, I am giving three people a copy for FREE! 💕✨⁣
⁣
To enter:⁣⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣⁣
✨ LIKE and SAVE this photo⁣. ⁣⁣⁣
✨ FOLLOW @thecalmclassroom ⁣⁣⁣⁣
✨ TAG one friend who would love this deck⁣!⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣⁣
That’s it! Bonus entries:⁣⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣⁣
✨TAG additional friends! Each additional tag is an extra entry. ⁣⁣⁣⁣
✨SHARE this post in your story. ⁣⁣⁣⁣
✨COMMENT with an emoji that shows how you’re feeling about going back to school. ⁣
⁣⁣⁣⁣
Open for entries worldwide until Sunday, August 8th at 8pm PST🤞🏻GOOD LUCK!⁣⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣
It is so important to have deep and thoughtful conversations with our little ones not only so we can improve our relationships with them and effectively meet their needs, but so that we can teach them to communicate respectfully and solve problems independently. Open conversation also creates community, builds safety and trust, and enhances learning. ⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣
This set of 59 cards includes 225 highly intentional questions, divided evenly (25 each) into the following categories:⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣
1. Icebreakers⁣⁣⁣
2. Getting Acquainted⁣⁣⁣
3. Wellness Checks⁣⁣⁣
4. Exploring Values⁣⁣⁣
5. Community Building⁣⁣⁣
6. Taking Responsibility⁣⁣⁣
7. Curriculum Connections⁣⁣⁣
8. Hopes & Dreams⁣⁣⁣
9. Discussion & Debate⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣
This deck was designed with children and adults in mind, and is perfect for individual and whole class activities, talking circles, morning meetings, journal prompts, anticipatory sets, and more. ⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣
Now available for $8.99 as a digital download on Etsy — link in bio ✨⁣
⁣
⁣⁣ Ps: We will contact you directly via DM from this account only and will never ask you for payment information. Stay safe out there y’all 💕

node.text:
NEW PRODUCT ALERT! 🚨✨⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣
MOTIVATE: A 31-Day Journal Series is ONLY $1.99 (reg. $4.99) until August 8th! Download your copy before price goes up FOREVER!⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣
MOTIVATE: A 31-day Journal Series contains questions to help you activate & engage your mind, clarify & consider your values, & find motivation to achieve your biggest goals. Now available for download as a printable or fillable PDF.⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣
JOURNALING TIPS:⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣
✨ Schedule journaling into your day so it becomes routine.⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣
✨ Journal independently in a peaceful place to allow for authentic self-reflection.⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣
✨ Some days you may want to write a little bit and other days you may want to write a lot. Both are okay.⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣
✨ Try to spend a few minutes thinking about each question before you respond.⁣
